lines.text:
[to the sideshow crowd]
That's all there is to life, friends - a little laughter... a little tear...
lines.character: Professor Echo, the ventriloquist, aka Mrs. 'Granny' O'Grady

lines.text: You're makin' a play for that guy!
lines.character: Professor Echo, the ventriloquist, aka Mrs. 'Granny' O'Grady

lines.text: Since when do you own me?
If you tip that boob off to who we are, I'll lay some lilies under your chin!
lines.character: Tweedledee, the dwarf, aka Little Willie

lines.text: Da-da! Da-da!
Get rid of him! We're gonna pull that Arlington job tonight.
lines.character: Professor Echo, the ventriloquist, aka Mrs. 'Granny' O'Grady

lines.text: Oh, I'm mad at Granny! She won't stay in bed!
Perhaps she wants to help us trim the tree.
Yes, she'd love to do some trimming.

[about Regan]
That dick has a line on us. We gotta think fast.
lines.character: Professor Echo, the ventriloquist, aka Mrs. 'Granny' O'Grady

lines.text: He's got a hunch Hector turned this trick. Let's plant the jewels in the boob's room!
lines.character: Tweedledee, the dwarf, aka Little Willie

lines.text: That's it! Make him the fall guy!

[as Mrs. O'Grady commenting on Tweedledee in the guise of a baby]
He's always been so fond of beads!
lines.character: Professor Echo, the ventriloquist, aka Mrs. 'Granny' O'Grady

lines.text: Hercules! The mighty... marvelous... mastodonic model of muscular masculinity!

[as the Dancer does the Shimmy]
Now, folks - that's just a sample of the little lady's art! The show on the inside starts immediately! See her do the dance that broke the Sultan's thermometer.
'Twas a balmy summer evening, And a goodly crowd was there.

[to her grandson after watching Hercules]
Never smoke cigarettes and you'll be a big strong man like him.
Professor Echo! God's gifted genius! The velvet-voiced ventriloquist!
Tweedledee! Twenty inches! Twenty years! Twenty pounds! The Twentieth Century Curiosity!

[At Midnight, talking to Hercules and Tweedledee]
You see, my plan is so ridiculous... so simple... that it scares you. But... if you come with me, we'll clean up millions.
lines.character: Professor Echo, the ventriloquist, aka Mrs. 'Granny' O'Grady

lines.text: [Tweedledee smiles]
It's spooky! It sounds... unholy!
That's it! We'll be the Unholy Three!
lines.character: Professor Echo, the ventriloquist, aka Mrs. 'Granny' O'Grady

lines.text: That guy bossin' me... me and my strength!
He's too jealous to leave her with that boob. Come on... we'll turn this trick alone!
lines.character: Tweedledee, the dwarf, aka Little Willie

lines.text: If I loved a man, he wouldn't have to have a dime!
What a bonehead I was to overlook that!
lines.character: Professor Echo, the ventriloquist, aka Mrs. 'Granny' O'Grady

lines.text: Now, laugh that off... you big stiff!
